reviewText: This is a beautiful production of several ballets that do not disappoint!  Margot Fonteyn and Rudolf Nureyev give unforgettable performances.  This DVD would be a nice addition to anyone's ballet collection.  I particularly enjoyed Les Sylphides with Chopin's glorious music and the superb dancing.
Title: An Evening with the Royal Ballet / Nureyev, Fonteyn

reviewText: I was a ballet student and huge ballet fan growing up in the 60s-70s, and had indulgent parents who would stretch their budget to allow me the occasional journey from Long Island to Manhattan to see visiting and NY ballet companies.  I was privileged to personally see a Fonteyn & Nureyev performance with the Royal Ballet, one of their last, of "Marguerite & Armand" at the Met in NY, and she was an aspiring young dancer's dream - beautiful, graceful, classic with perfect form, and what EMOTION; she was the only ballerina I ever saw who put her whole heart and soul into the character, and owned it.  It is wonderful that some of this talent is preserved in films like "Evening with the Royal Ballet" and also Czinner's "Royal Ballet," both of which feature Fonteyn in select acts of famous ballets.  I have also recently purchased the Fonteyn biography by Meredith Daneman which was interesting but mostly speculation; if you really want to learn about Fonteyn, her art always came first, and it is much better to snap up as many performance DVDs or tapes as you can find like this one, to have a true understanding of this amazing prima ballerina assoluta and why she was so beloved.
Title: An Evening with the Royal Ballet / Nureyev, Fonteyn

reviewText: This should help a student or fan by observing the beauty of the dance, the grace of the artists, the music, as well as the atmosphere of  the theatre.
Title: An Evening with the Royal Ballet / Nureyev, Fonteyn

reviewText: For anyone who loves ballet, this is for you. Superb dancing, well scripted and acted. For some, the dancing might be a little repetitious.
summary: An Evening with the Royal Ballet / Nureyev, Fontein
Title: An Evening with the Royal Ballet / Nureyev, Fonteyn

reviewText: I bought this DVD to get a permanent record of Fonteyn and Nureyev dancing in Les Sylphides. I wasn't disappointed! It is a perfect record of a perfect "white" ballet.
summary: A perfect record of a perfect ballet!
Title: An Evening with the Royal Ballet / Nureyev, Fonteyn

reviewText: I have a 6 years old daughter and we missed our bed time because we  just could not stop watching the performance. It's truly amazing, ballet at it's best.
Title: An Evening with the Royal Ballet / Nureyev, Fonteyn
